statements: advise select 1 from shellTest AS b where (NOW_MILLIS() - STR_TO_MILLIS(b.f1.time))/1000 > 300

indexes.recommending_rule: Index keys follow order of predicate types: 5. less than/greater than.

results.query: select 1 from shellTest AS b where (NOW_MILLIS() - STR_TO_MILLIS(b.f1.time))/1000 > 300

statements: advise SELECT a.c1, u111 FROM shellTest AS a UNNEST a.a1 AS u1 UNNEST u1.a11 AS u11 UNNEST u11.a111 AS u111 WHERE a.o1.id = 'abc' AND u111.name = 'xyz'

indexes.index_statement: CREATE INDEX adv_ALL_a1_a11_a111_name_o1_id ON `shellTest`(ALL ARRAY (ALL ARRAY (ALL ARRAY `u111`.`name` FOR u111 IN `u11`.`a111` END) FOR u11 IN `u1`.`a11` END) FOR u1 IN `a1` END,`o1`.`id`)
indexes.recommending_rule: Index keys follow order of predicate types: 1. leading array index for unnest, 2. equality/null/missing.

results.query: SELECT a.c1, u111 FROM shellTest AS a UNNEST a.a1 AS u1 UNNEST u1.a11 AS u11 UNNEST u11.a111 AS u111 WHERE a.o1.id = 'abc' AND u111.name = 'xyz'
